meanings.sent1: She is the illest dancer in our group.
meanings.sent2: That new song is the illest track I've heard all year.
meanings.sent3: His illest dance move always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The illest skateboarder in town glides effortlessly through the park.
meanings.sent5: The illest party of the summer had everyone talking for weeks.

meanings.definition: The best or most extreme in a particular category
meanings.sent1: He was crowned the illest of the chess players in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The illest of the desserts at the bakery is the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The illest of the jokes had everyone laughing until they cried.
meanings.sent4: She proved to be the illest of the hikers, reaching the summit first.
meanings.sent5: The illest of the cars in the show was a vintage red convertible.
